snippet.title: Vox Populi, Vox Dei(a werewolf thriller) Walkthrough
snippet.description:
This is a walkthrough of the game "Vox Populi, Vox Dei(a werewolf thriller)".

Play the game here: http://www.kongregate.com/games/weremsoft/vox-populi-vox-dei-a-werewolf-thriller

You can visit my Patreon page if you want or something:
https://www.patreon.com/awalkthroughlife

Game created by weremsoft
___________
Game description (from creator):
Use arrow keys to move
SPACE to jump
Hold DOWN and then press SPACE to attack
Other controls explained during the game.

Start a bloody quest to rescue the girl that hurt you from the hands of the planet’s dominant race: The werewolves..

IMPORTANT: The ALGORITHM OF AWESOMENESS used in the game requires FLASH PLAYER 10! Update your player

This game was made just by one person, but playtested by many, many people. Check the “credits” section.

A game made for the people, judged by the people.

A great story, driven by great characters and with one or two technological innovations.
___________
#walkthrough #werewolf
